ch.njol.skript

Class SkriptConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.njol.skript.SkriptConfig

  • public abstract class SkriptConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Important: don't save values from the config, a '/skript reload config/configs/all' won't work correctly otherwise!
    Author:
    Peter GÃ¼ttinger
